title: Tanooki Mario
caption: In Super Mario Bros. 3, Mario can change into this form my obtaining a Tanooki Suit.

title: Statue Mario
caption: Mario can change into an invulnerable jizo statue when in Tanooki form.

title: Tanoombas
caption: Tanoombas can be found as an enemy in Mario & Luigi: Superstar Saga.

title: Zizagoon
caption: Zizagoon in Pokemon is possibly inspired by a tanuki.

title: Gaara and Shukaku
caption: Shukaku, one of the nine tailed beasts was last sealed within Gaara.
